thread.title: Georgia landscaper caught having sex with homeowner’s dog
thread.title_full: Georgia landscaper caught having sex with homeowner’s dog

title: Georgia landscaper caught having sex with homeowner’s dog
text:
Georgia landscaper caught having sex with homeowner’s dog Georgia landscaper caught having sex with homeowner’s dog THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Jail records show that 61-year-old Cruz Barrera-Lugo turned himself in to authorities Monday. (Gwinnett County Police Department) THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Tuesday, February 14, 2017, 9:26 AM 
LAWRENCEVILLE, Ga. — An Atlanta-area man has turned himself in after he was accused of engaging in a sex act with a dog while working as a landscaper. 
Jail records show that 61-year-old Cruz Barrera-Lugo turned himself in to authorities Monday. 
A Lawrenceville man called police Saturday to report that he was playing in his yard with his nephew when they saw the landscaper participating in "a lewd sexual act" with their dog. 
The man said Barrera-Lugo fled when he realized he'd been seen. 
Police say surveillance video captured the incident. 
Barrera-Lugo has been charged with bestiality and cruelty to children. 
The suspect's last name is listed in jail records as "Barrera-Lugo." 
Previous information distributed by Gwinnett County police gave his name as Barreralugo. 
He was being held without bond. It's unclear whether he has an attorney. Join the Conversation:
